au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: AgBE_L2=1.5m_central
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(700,0) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #beamstop command removed in this config selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.4) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(27.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(27.5, 0) driveBsz(260)
